Package ghost

Class GameParser

java.lang.Object
ghost.GameParser
public class GameParser
extends java.lang.Object
main controller of the game, control the logic of the game.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    boolean debugMode
    If this variables is true, draw the line.
    int frame
    Count the current frame of the game.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    GameParser​(App gameWindow)
    set a game's screen for this game parser

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addGhostStartPoint​(Message new_Ghost)
    For Junit test, adding ghost to ghost arraylist.
    boolean catchTarget​(Message ghostPosition, Message playerPosition)
    See if player is caught by a ghost
    void clearLastFrame()
    Clean the image and redraw it
    void drawDebugLine​(Message ghostMessage)
    Draw the debug line between ghost and it's target
    void drawStartMap()
    read every grids and draw they out, initialize the position of player.
    void fontBinding()
    reading the files of fonts.
    void gameInit()
    Called at the start of each time that game starting, reset the ghost mode, reset the frame, adding all ghost again.
    void mapElementRenderSwitch​(int x, int y, boolean firstTime)
    Render each grid, if it is the first time to render the map, counting the number of fruit and superfruit
    void mapRender​(boolean firstTime)
    reading the map file and read the map, render the map using the integer which represent different object.
    void playerEatSomething​(Message position)
    If player is at the same position of fruit, superfruit or soda can, eat this item, if it is fruit, reduce the remain number, if it is a superfruit, reduce the remain number, turn player into invincible and ghost become frightened, if it is a soda can, the ghost will become invisible.
    void playerRender​(Message position)
    Render the image of player according to player's current direction
    void refreshData()
    reload the ghosts, refresh the map, replace the props and reset the basic properties (lives, speed, length of the mode) by reading the file.
    void resourcesBinding()
    reading the files of images.
    void runEachFrame()
    Run in each frame and renew the information If there is not remaining fruit or lives, game restart after 10 seconds In each frame, ghost and player run and this system will detect whether they are in the same grids (collision) In debug mode, it will draw a white line In frightened mode, ghost will change the image and if they encounter the player, they will die In soda can mode, ghost will not display but debug line still works
    void runNewGame()
    Start a new game
    void runStartFrame()
    Run the first frame of the game, refresh the data and draw the map.
    void setFrightenedModeOn​(boolean onOrOff)
    For Junit test, turn on or off the frightened mode
    boolean sleep​(int seconds)
    Count specific seconds
    void updateGhostMode()
    Update the counter of ghost mode, change the mode to normal if it's over

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Field Details

    • frame

      public int frame
      Count the current frame of the game.

    • debugMode

      public boolean debugMode
      If this variables is true, draw the line.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameParser

      public GameParser​(App gameWindow)
      set a game's screen for this game parser

  • Method Details

    • resourcesBinding

      public void resourcesBinding()
      reading the files of images.

    • fontBinding

      public void fontBinding()
      reading the files of fonts.

    • addGhostStartPoint

      public void addGhostStartPoint​(Message new_Ghost)
      For Junit test, adding ghost to ghost arraylist.
      Parameters:
      new_Ghost - the starting position of the ghost

    • gameInit

      public void gameInit()
      Called at the start of each time that game starting, reset the ghost mode, reset the frame, adding all ghost again.

    • mapRender

      public void mapRender​(boolean firstTime)
      reading the map file and read the map, render the map using the integer which represent different object. if it is the first time to read the file, then calculate the edge value.
      Parameters:
      firstTime - if it is true it means it is the first time to render this map

    • mapElementRenderSwitch

      public void mapElementRenderSwitch​(int x, int y, boolean firstTime)
      Render each grid, if it is the first time to render the map, counting the number of fruit and superfruit
      Parameters:
      x - x-axis of the position
      y - y-axis of the position
      firstTime - if it is true it means it is the first time to render this map

    • playerEatSomething

      public void playerEatSomething​(Message position)
      If player is at the same position of fruit, superfruit or soda can, eat this item, if it is fruit, reduce the remain number, if it is a superfruit, reduce the remain number, turn player into invincible and ghost become frightened, if it is a soda can, the ghost will become invisible.
      Parameters:
      position - position of player

    • playerRender

      public void playerRender​(Message position)
      Render the image of player according to player's current direction
      Parameters:
      position - position of player

    • clearLastFrame

      public void clearLastFrame()
      Clean the image and redraw it

    • setFrightenedModeOn

      public void setFrightenedModeOn​(boolean onOrOff)
      For Junit test, turn on or off the frightened mode
      Parameters:
      onOrOff - if it is true it means turn on the frightened mode

    • updateGhostMode

      public void updateGhostMode()
      Update the counter of ghost mode, change the mode to normal if it's over

    • drawDebugLine

      public void drawDebugLine​(Message ghostMessage)
      Draw the debug line between ghost and it's target
      Parameters:
      ghostMessage - a message contain the position of the ghost and the position of ghost's current target

    • refreshData

      public void refreshData()
      reload the ghosts, refresh the map, replace the props and reset the basic properties (lives, speed, length of the mode) by reading the file.

    • runStartFrame

      public void runStartFrame()
      Run the first frame of the game, refresh the data and draw the map.

    • drawStartMap

      public void drawStartMap()
      read every grids and draw they out, initialize the position of player.

    • catchTarget

      public boolean catchTarget​(Message ghostPosition, Message playerPosition)
      See if player is caught by a ghost
      Parameters:
      ghostPosition - the position of the ghost
      playerPosition - the position of the player
      Returns:
      true when one is run into another

    • sleep

      public boolean sleep​(int seconds)
      Count specific seconds
      Parameters:
      seconds - Seconds need to wait
      Returns:
      If it's already delay the specific seconds, return true

    • runNewGame

      public void runNewGame()
      Start a new game

    • runEachFrame

      public void runEachFrame()
      Run in each frame and renew the information If there is not remaining fruit or lives, game restart after 10 seconds In each frame, ghost and player run and this system will detect whether they are in the same grids (collision) In debug mode, it will draw a white line In frightened mode, ghost will change the image and if they encounter the player, they will die In soda can mode, ghost will not display but debug line still works
